attributes.title: Sad!
attributes.review: This app is so sad! I have the best reviews and this app doesn't deserve my appreciation it crashes a lot and it questions me on my age can you believe this?! Believe me people this is horrible. I'd like it if it wasn't a fascist leader.

attributes.title: Great app
attributes.review: Easy to find info across multiple platforms.

attributes.title: Love this app
attributes.review: Very informative app! For once I don't feel like I'm the last to know top stories & I'm not relying on the media.

attributes.title: President Trump, President Trump, President Trump
attributes.review:
Awesome way to stay up to date with campaign updates and getting to know patriots around the nation and your state! 
Make America Great Again!

attributes.title: This is how you campaign in 2016!
attributes.review: This app is great! This is how you get things done in 2016! Everyone should download and get started!

attributes.title: Love it, but can't see anything
attributes.review: Great app, I just wish the text wasn't sooooo tiny. Hard to see, I can only read headlines unless I grab a magnifier.

attributes.title: Trump is the best ever
attributes.review: Love this app , if I miss something it makes me aware of it so I don't hear it from the lying talking heads on mainstream news channels # Lets go Trump

attributes.title: We have the best apps.
attributes.review: We have only the best apps. Really just great apps. Only the best. You wanna know which apps to use? Ours. That's who's. They're the best.

attributes.title: TRUMP!
attributes.review: This app an addiction. Find myself checking hourly for posts, updates and pretty much everything to know about Trump becoming POTUS!

attributes.title: All Trump All Day💪🏼🇺🇸💪🏼
attributes.review: I'll take all the DJT I can get. It's a cool little app! Interesting nuggets, latest updates and ways to show your support. I love it!
